text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: brahmaNo mAnasAH putrA viditAH SaN maharSayaH
text.ur: brahmaṇo mānasāḥ putrā viditāḥ ṣaṇ maharṣayaḥ

text.ascii: ekAdaza sutAH sthANoH khyAtAH paramamAnasAH
text.ur: ekādaśa sutāḥ sthāṇoḥ khyātāḥ paramamānasāḥ

text.ascii: mRgavyAdhaz ca zarvaz ca nirRtiz ca mahAyazAH
text.ur: mr̥gavyādhaś ca śarvaś ca nirr̥tiś ca mahāyaśāḥ

text.ascii: ajaikapAd ahirbudhnyaH pinAkI ca paraMtapaH
text.ur: ajaikapād ahirbudhnyaḥ pinākī ca paraṁtapaḥ

text.ascii: dahano 'thezvaraz caiva kapAlI ca mahAdyutiH
text.ur: dahano ’theśvaraś caiva kapālī ca mahādyutiḥ

text.ascii: sthANur bhavaz ca bhagavAn rudrA ekAdaza smRtAH
text.ur: sthāṇur bhavaś ca bhagavān rudrā ekādaśa smr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: marIcir aGgirA atriH pulastyaH pulahaH kratuH
text.ur: marīcir aṅgirā atriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ

text.ascii: SaD ete brahmaNaH putrA vIryavanto maharSayaH
text.ur: ṣaḍ ete brahmaṇaḥ putrā vīryavanto maharṣayaḥ

text.ascii: trayas tv aGgirasaH putrA loke sarvatra vizrutAH
text.ur: trayas tv aṅgirasaḥ putrā loke sarvatra viśrutāḥ

text.ascii: bRhaspatir utathyaz ca saMvartaz ca dhRtavratAH
text.ur: br̥haspatir utathyaś ca saṁvartaś ca dhr̥tavratāḥ

text.ascii: atres tu bahavaH putrAH zrUyante manujAdhipa
text.ur: atres tu bahavaḥ putrāḥ śrūyante manujādhipa

text.ascii: sarve vedavidaH siddhAH zAntAtmAno maharSayaH
text.ur: sarve vedavidaḥ siddhāḥ śāntātmāno maharṣayaḥ

text.ascii: rAkSasAs tu pulastyasya vAnarAH kiMnarAs tathA
text.ur: rākṣasās tu pulastyasya vānarāḥ kiṁnarās tathā

text.ascii: pulahasya mRgAH siMhA vyAghrAH kiMpuruSAs tathA
text.ur: pulahasya mr̥gāḥ siṁhā vyāghrāḥ kiṁpuruṣās tathā

text.ascii: kratoH kratusamAH putrAH pataMgasahacAriNaH
text.ur: kratoḥ kratusamāḥ putrāḥ pataṁgasahacāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: vizrutAs triSu lokeSu satyavrataparAyaNAH
text.ur: viśrutās triṣu lokeṣu satyavrataparāyaṇāḥ

text.ascii: dakSas tv ajAyatAGguSThAd dakSiNAd bhagavAn RSiH
text.ur: dakṣas tv ajāyatāṅguṣṭhād dakṣiṇād bhagavān r̥ṣiḥ

text.ascii: brahmaNaH pRthivIpAla putraH putravatAM varaH
text.ur: brahmaṇaḥ pr̥thivīpāla putraḥ putravatāṁ varaḥ

text.ascii: vAmAd ajAyatAGguSThAd bhAryA tasya mahAtmanaH
text.ur: vāmād ajāyatāṅguṣṭhād bhāryā tasya mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: tasyAM paJcAzataM kanyAH sa evAjanayan muniH
text.ur: tasyāṁ pañcāśataṁ kanyāḥ sa evājanayan muniḥ

text.ascii: tAH sarvAs tv anavadyAGgyaH kanyAH kamalalocanAH
text.ur: tāḥ sarvās tv anavadyāṅgyaḥ kanyāḥ kamalalocanāḥ

text.ascii: putrikAH sthApayAm Asa naSTaputraH prajApatiH
text.ur: putrikāḥ sthāpayām āsa naṣṭaputraḥ prajāpatiḥ

text.ascii: dadau sa daza dharmAya saptaviMzatim indave
text.ur: dadau sa daśa dharmāya saptaviṁśatim indave

text.ascii: divyena vidhinA rAjan kazyapAya trayodaza
text.ur: divyena vidhinā rājan kaśyapāya trayodaśa

text.ascii: nAmato dharmapatnyas tAH kIrtyamAnA nibodha me
text.ur: nāmato dharmapatnyas tāḥ kīrtyamānā nibodha me

text.ascii: kIrtir lakSmIr dhRtir medhA puSTiH zraddhA kriyA tathA
text.ur: kīrtir lakṣmīr dhr̥tir medhā puṣṭiḥ śraddhā kriyā tathā

text.ascii: buddhir lajjA matiz caiva patnyo dharmasya tA daza
text.ud: बुद्धिर्लज्जा मतिश्चैव पत्न्यो धर्मस्य ता दश
text.ur: buddhir lajjā matiś caiva patnyo dharmasya tā daśa

text.ascii: dvArANy etAni dharmasya vihitAni svayaMbhuvA
text.ur: dvārāṇy etāni dharmasya vihitāni svayaṁbhuvā

text.ascii: saptaviMzati somasya patnyo loke parizrutAH
text.ur: saptaviṁśati somasya patnyo loke pariśrutāḥ

text.ascii: kAlasya nayane yuktAH somapatnyaH zubhavratAH
text.ur: kālasya nayane yuktāḥ somapatnyaḥ śubhavratāḥ

text.ascii: sarvA nakSatrayoginyo lokayAtrAvidhau sthitAH
text.ur: sarvā nakṣatrayoginyo lokayātrāvidhau sthitāḥ

text.ascii: pitAmaho munir devas tasya putraH prajApatiH
text.ur: pitāmaho munir devas tasya putraḥ prajāpatiḥ

text.ascii: tasyASTau vasavaH putrAs teSAM vakSyAmi vistaram
text.ur: tasyāṣṭau vasavaḥ putrās teṣāṁ vakṣyāmi vistaram

text.ascii: dharo dhruvaz ca somaz ca ahaz caivAnilo 'nalaH
text.ur: dharo dhruvaś ca somaś ca ahaś caivānilo ’nalaḥ

text.ascii: pratyUSaz ca prabhAsaz ca vasavo 'STAv iti smRtAH
text.ur: pratyūṣaś ca prabhāsaś ca vasavo ’ṣṭāv iti smr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: dhUmrAyAz ca dharaH putro brahmavidyo dhruvas tathA
text.ur: dhūmrāyāś ca dharaḥ putro brahmavidyo dhruvas tathā

text.ascii: candramAs tu manasvinyAH zvasAyAH zvasanas tathA
text.ur: candramās tu manasvinyāḥ śvasāyāḥ śvasanas tathā

text.ascii: ratAyAz cApy ahaH putraH zANDilyAz ca hutAzanaH
text.ur: ratāyāś cāpy ahaḥ putraḥ śāṇḍilyāś ca hutāśanaḥ

text.ascii: pratyUSaz ca prabhAsaz ca prabhAtAyAH sutau smRtau
text.ur: pratyūṣaś ca prabhāsaś ca prabhātāyāḥ sutau smr̥tau

text.ascii: dharasya putro draviNo hutahavyavahas tathA
text.ur: dharasya putro draviṇo hutahavyavahas tathā

text.ascii: dhruvasya putro bhagavAn kAlo lokaprakAlanaH
text.ur: dhruvasya putro bhagavān kālo lokaprakālanaḥ

text.ascii: somasya tu suto varcA varcasvI yena jAyate
text.ud: सोमस्य तु सुतो वर्चा वर्चस्वी येन जायते
text.ur: somasya tu suto varcā varcasvī yena jāyate

text.ascii: manoharAyAH ziziraH prANo 'tha ramaNas tathA
text.ur: manoharāyāḥ śiśiraḥ prāṇo ’tha ramaṇas tathā

text.ascii: ahnaH sutaH smRto jyotiH zramaH zAntas tathA muniH
text.ud: अह्नः सुतः स्मृतो ज्योतिः श्रमः शान्तस्तथा मुनिः
text.ur: ahnaḥ sutaḥ smr̥to jyotiḥ śramaḥ śāntas tathā muniḥ

text.ascii: agneH putraH kumAras tu zrImAJ zaravaNAlayaH
text.ur: agneḥ putraḥ kumāras tu śrīmāñ śaravaṇālayaḥ

text.ascii: tasya zAkho vizAkhaz ca naigamezaz ca pRSThajaH
text.ur: tasya śākho viśākhaś ca naigameśaś ca pr̥ṣṭhajaḥ

text.ascii: kRttikAbhyupapattez ca kArttikeya iti smRtaH
text.ur: kr̥ttikābhyupapatteś ca kārttikeya iti smr̥taḥ

text.ascii: anilasya zivA bhAryA tasyAH putraH purojavaH
text.ud: अनिलस्य शिवा भार्या तस्याः पुत्रः पुरोजवः
text.ur: anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ purojavaḥ

text.ascii: avijJAtagatiz caiva dvau putrAv anilasya tu
text.ur: avijñātagatiś caiva dvau putrāv anilasya tu

text.ascii: pratyUSasya viduH putram RSiM nAmnAtha devalam
text.ur: pratyūṣasya viduḥ putram r̥ṣiṁ nāmnātha devalam

text.ascii: dvau putrau devalasyApi kSamAvantau manISiNau
text.ur: dvau putrau devalasyāpi kṣamāvantau manīṣiṇau

text.ascii: bRhaspates tu bhaginI varastrI brahmacAriNI
text.ur: br̥haspates tu bhaginī varastrī brahmacāriṇī

text.ascii: yogasiddhA jagat sarvam asaktaM vicaraty uta
text.ur: yogasiddhā jagat sarvam asaktaṁ vicaraty uta

text.ascii: prabhAsasya tu bhAryA sA vasUnAm aSTamasya ha
text.ud: प्रभासस्य तु भार्या सा वसूनामष्टमस्य ह
text.ur: prabhāsasya tu bhāryā sā vasūnām aṣṭamasya ha

text.ascii: vizvakarmA mahAbhAgo jajJe zilpaprajApatiH
text.ur: viśvakarmā mahābhāgo jajñe śilpaprajāpatiḥ

text.ascii: kartA zilpasahasrANAM tridazAnAM ca vardhakiH
text.ur: kartā śilpasahasrāṇāṁ tridaśānāṁ ca vardhakiḥ

text.ascii: bhUSaNAnAM ca sarveSAM kartA zilpavatAM varaH
text.ud: भूषणानां च सर्वेषां कर्ता शिल्पवतां वरः
text.ur: bhūṣaṇānāṁ ca sarveṣāṁ kartā śilpavatāṁ varaḥ

text.ascii: yo divyAni vimAnAni devatAnAM cakAra ha
text.ud: यो दिव्यानि विमानानि देवतानां चकार ह
text.ur: yo divyāni vimānāni devatānāṁ cakāra ha

text.ascii: manuSyAz copajIvanti yasya zilpaM mahAtmanaH
text.ur: manuṣyāś copajīvanti yasya śilpaṁ mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: pUjayanti ca yaM nityaM vizvakarmANam avyayam
text.ur: pūjayanti ca yaṁ nityaṁ viśvakarmāṇam avyayam

text.ascii: stanaM tu dakSiNaM bhittvA brahmaNo naravigrahaH
text.ud: स्तनं तु दक्षिणं भित्त्वा ब्रह्मणो नरविग्रहः
text.ur: stanaṁ tu dakṣiṇaṁ bhittvā brahmaṇo naravigrahaḥ

text.ascii: niHsRto bhagavAn dharmaH sarvalokasukhAvahaH
text.ur: niḥsr̥to bhagavān dharmaḥ sarvalokasukhāvahaḥ

text.ascii: trayas tasya varAH putrAH sarvabhUtamanoharAH
text.ur: trayas tasya varāḥ putrāḥ sarvabhūtamanoharāḥ

text.ascii: zamaH kAmaz ca harSaz ca tejasA lokadhAriNaH
text.ur: śamaḥ kāmaś ca harṣaś ca tejasā lokadhāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: kAmasya tu ratir bhAryA zamasya prAptir aGganA
text.ur: kāmasya tu ratir bhāryā śamasya prāptir aṅganā

text.ascii: nandI tu bhAryA harSasya yatra lokAH pratiSThitAH
text.ud: नन्दी तु भार्या हर्षस्य यत्र लोकाः प्रतिष्ठिताः
text.ur: nandī tu bhāryā harṣasya yatra lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

text.ascii: marIceH kazyapaH putraH kazyapasya surAsurAH
text.ur: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putraḥ kaśyapasya surāsurāḥ

text.ascii: jajJire nRpazArdUla lokAnAM prabhavas tu saH
text.ur: jajñire nr̥paśārdūla lokānāṁ prabhavas tu saḥ

text.ascii: tvASTrI tu savitur bhAryA vaDavArUpadhAriNI
text.ur: tvāṣṭrī tu savitur bhāryā vaḍavārūpadhāriṇī

text.ascii: asUyata mahAbhAgA sAntarikSe 'zvinAv ubhau
text.ur: asūyata mahābhāgā sāntarikṣe ’śvināv ubhau

text.ascii: dvAdazaivAditeH putrAH zakramukhyA narAdhipa
text.ur: dvādaśaivāditeḥ putrāḥ śakramukhyā narādhipa

text.ascii: teSAm avarajo viSNur yatra lokAH pratiSThitAH
text.ur: teṣām avarajo viṣṇur yatra lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

text.ascii: trayas triMzata ity ete devAs teSAm ahaM tava
text.ur: trayas triṁśata ity ete devās teṣām ahaṁ tava

text.ascii: anvayaM saMpravakSyAmi pakSaiz ca kulato gaNAn
text.ur: anvayaṁ saṁpravakṣyāmi pakṣaiś ca kulato gaṇān

text.ascii: rudrANAm aparaH pakSaH sAdhyAnAM marutAM tathA
text.ur: rudrāṇām aparaḥ pakṣaḥ sādhyānāṁ marutāṁ tathā

text.ascii: vasUnAM bhArgavaM vidyAd vizvedevAMs tathaiva ca
text.ur: vasūnāṁ bhārgavaṁ vidyād viśvedevāṁs tathaiva ca

text.ascii: vainateyas tu garuDo balavAn aruNas tathA
text.ur: vainateyas tu garuḍo balavān aruṇas tathā

text.ascii: bRhaspatiz ca bhagavAn AdityeSv eva gaNyate
text.ur: br̥haspatiś ca bhagavān ādityeṣv eva gaṇyate

text.ascii: azvibhyAM guhyakAn viddhi sarvauSadhyas tathA pazUn
text.ur: aśvibhyāṁ guhyakān viddhi sarvauṣadhyas tathā paśūn

text.ascii: eSa devagaNo rAjan kIrtitas te 'nupUrvazaH
text.ur: eṣa devagaṇo rājan kīrtitas te ’nupūrvaśaḥ

text.ascii: yaM kIrtayitvA manujaH sarvapApaiH pramucyate
text.ur: yaṁ kīrtayitvā manujaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate

text.ascii: brahmaNo hRdayaM bhittvA niHsRto bhagavAn bhRguH
text.ur: brahmaṇo hr̥dayaṁ bhittvā niḥsr̥to bhagavān bhr̥guḥ

text.ascii: bhRgoH putraH kavir vidvAJ zukraH kavisuto grahaH
text.ur: bhr̥goḥ putraḥ kavir vidvāñ śukraḥ kavisuto grahaḥ

text.ascii: trailokyaprANayAtrArthe varSAvarSe bhayAbhaye
text.ur: trailokyaprāṇayātrārthe varṣāvarṣe bhayābhaye

text.ascii: svayaMbhuvA niyuktaH san bhuvanaM paridhAvati
text.ur: svayaṁbhuvā niyuktaḥ san bhuvanaṁ paridhāvati

text.ascii: yogAcAryo mahAbuddhir daityAnAm abhavad guruH
text.ur: yogācāryo mahābuddhir daityānām abhavad guruḥ

text.ascii: surANAM cApi medhAvI brahmacArI yatavrataH
text.ur: surāṇāṁ cāpi medhāvī brahmacārī yatavrataḥ

text.ascii: tasmin niyukte vibhunA yogakSemAya bhArgave
text.ur: tasmin niyukte vibhunā yogakṣemāya bhārgave

text.ascii: anyam utpAdayAm Asa putraM bhRgur aninditam
text.ur: anyam utpādayām āsa putraṁ bhr̥gur aninditam

text.ascii: cyavanaM dIptatapasaM dharmAtmAnaM manISiNam
text.ur: cyavanaṁ dīptatapasaṁ dharmātmānaṁ manīṣiṇam

text.ascii: yaH sa roSAc cyuto garbhAn mAtur mokSAya bhArata
text.ur: yaḥ sa roṣāc cyuto garbhān mātur mokṣāya bhārata

text.ascii: AruSI tu manoH kanyA tasya patnI manISiNaH
text.ud: आरुषी तु मनोः कन्या तस्य पत्नी मनीषिणः
text.ur: āruṣī tu manoḥ kanyā tasya patnī manīṣiṇaḥ

text.ascii: aurvas tasyAM samabhavad UruM bhittvA mahAyazAH
text.ur: aurvas tasyāṁ samabhavad ūruṁ bhittvā mahāyaśāḥ

text.ascii: mahAtapA mahAtejA bAla eva guNair yutaH
text.ur: mahātapā mahātejā bāla eva guṇair yutaḥ

text.ascii: RcIkas tasya putras tu jamadagnis tato 'bhavat
text.ur: r̥cīkas tasya putras tu jamadagnis tato ’bhavat

text.ascii: jamadagnes tu catvAra Asan putrA mahAtmanaH
text.ur: jamadagnes tu catvāra āsan putrā mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: rAmas teSAM jaghanyo 'bhUd ajaghanyair guNair yutaH
text.ur: rāmas teṣāṁ jaghanyo ’bhūd ajaghanyair guṇair yutaḥ

text.ascii: sarvazastrAstrakuzalaH kSatriyAntakaro vazI
text.ur: sarvaśastrāstrakuśalaḥ kṣatriyāntakaro vaśī

text.ascii: aurvasyAsIt putrazataM jamadagnipurogamam
text.ur: aurvasyāsīt putraśataṁ jamadagnipurogamam

text.ascii: teSAM putrasahasrANi babhUvur bhRguvistaraH
text.ur: teṣāṁ putrasahasrāṇi babhūvur bhr̥guvistaraḥ

text.ascii: dvau putrau brahmaNas tv anyau yayos tiSThati lakSaNam
text.ur: dvau putrau brahmaṇas tv anyau yayos tiṣṭhati lakṣaṇam

text.ascii: loke dhAtA vidhAtA ca yau sthitau manunA saha
text.ud: लोके धाता विधाता च यौ स्थितौ मनुना सह
text.ur: loke dhātā vidhātā ca yau sthitau manunā saha

text.ascii: tayor eva svasA devI lakSmIH padmagRhA zubhA
text.ud: तयोरेव स्वसा देवी लक्ष्मीः पद्मगृहा शुभा
text.ur: tayor eva svasā devī lakṣmīḥ padmagr̥hā śubhā

text.ascii: tasyAs tu mAnasAH putrAs turagA vyomacAriNaH
text.ur: tasyās tu mānasāḥ putrās turagā vyomacāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: varuNasya bhAryA jyeSThA tu zukrAd devI vyajAyata
text.ud: वरुणस्य भार्या ज्येष्ठा तु शुक्राद्देवी व्यजायत
text.ur: varuṇasya bhāryā jyeṣṭhā tu śukrād devī vyajāyata

text.ascii: tasyAH putraM balaM viddhi surAM ca suranandinIm
text.ud: तस्याः पुत्रं बलं विद्धि सुरां च सुरनन्दिनीम्
text.ur: tasyāḥ putraṁ balaṁ viddhi surāṁ ca suranandinīm

text.ascii: prajAnAm annakAmAnAm anyonyaparibhakSaNAt
text.ur: prajānām annakāmānām anyonyaparibhakṣaṇāt

text.ascii: adharmas tatra saMjAtaH sarvabhUtavinAzanaH
text.ur: adharmas tatra saṁjātaḥ sarvabhūtavināśanaḥ

text.ascii: tasyApi nirRtir bhAryA nairRtA yena rAkSasAH
text.ur: tasyāpi nirr̥tir bhāryā nairr̥tā yena rākṣasāḥ

text.ascii: ghorAs tasyAs trayaH putrAH pApakarmaratAH sadA
text.ur: ghorās tasyās trayaḥ putrāḥ pāpakarmaratāḥ sadā

text.ascii: bhayo mahAbhayaz caiva mRtyur bhUtAntakas tathA
text.ur: bhayo mahābhayaś caiva mr̥tyur bhūtāntakas tathā

text.ascii: kAkIM zyenIM ca bhAsIM ca dhRtarASTrIM tathA zukIm
text.ud: काकीं श्येनीं च भासीं च धृतराष्ट्रीं तथा शुकीम्
text.ur: kākīṁ śyenīṁ ca bhāsīṁ ca dhr̥tarāṣṭrīṁ tathā śukīm

text.ascii: tAmrA tu suSuve devI paJcaitA lokavizrutAH
text.ud: ताम्रा तु सुषुवे देवी पञ्चैता लोकविश्रुताः
text.ur: tāmrā tu suṣuve devī pañcaitā lokaviśrutāḥ

text.ascii: ulUkAn suSuve kAkI zyenI zyenAn vyajAyata
text.ur: ulūkān suṣuve kākī śyenī śyenān vyajāyata

text.ascii: bhAsI bhAsAn ajanayad gRdhrAMz caiva janAdhipa
text.ur: bhāsī bhāsān ajanayad gr̥dhrāṁś caiva janādhipa

text.ascii: dhRtarASTrI tu haMsAMz ca kalahaMsAMz ca sarvazaH
text.ur: dhr̥tarāṣṭrī tu haṁsāṁś ca kalahaṁsāṁś ca sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: cakravAkAMz ca bhadraM te prajajJe sA tu bhAminI
text.ud: चक्रवाकांश्च भद्रं ते प्रजज्ञे सा तु भामिनी
text.ur: cakravākāṁś ca bhadraṁ te prajajñe sā tu bhāminī

text.ascii: zukI vijajJe dharmajJa zukAn eva manasvinI
text.ur: śukī vijajñe dharmajña śukān eva manasvinī

text.ascii: kalyANaguNasaMpannA sarvalakSaNapUjitA
text.ur: kalyāṇaguṇasaṁpannā sarvalakṣaṇapūjitā

text.ascii: nava krodhavazA nArIH prajajJe 'py AtmasaMbhavAH
text.ur: nava krodhavaśā nārīḥ prajajñe ’py ātmasaṁbhavāḥ

text.ascii: mRgIM ca mRgamandAM ca hariM bhadramanAm api
text.ud: मृगीं च मृगमन्दां च हरिं भद्रमनामपि
text.ur: mr̥gīṁ ca mr̥gamandāṁ ca hariṁ bhadramanām api

text.ascii: mAtaGgIm atha zArdUlIM zvetAM surabhim eva ca
text.ur: mātaṅgīm atha śārdūlīṁ śvetāṁ surabhim eva ca

text.ascii: sarvalakSaNasaMpannAM surasAM ca yazasvinIm
text.ur: sarvalakṣaṇasaṁpannāṁ surasāṁ ca yaśasvinīm

text.ascii: apatyaM tu mRgAH sarve mRgyA naravarAtmaja
text.ud: अपत्यं तु मृगाः सर्वे मृग्या नरवरात्मज
text.ur: apatyaṁ tu mr̥gāḥ sarve mr̥gyā naravarātmaja

text.ascii: RkSAz ca mRgamandAyAH sRmarAz camarA api
text.ur: r̥kṣāś ca mr̥gamandāyāḥ sr̥marāś camarā api

text.ascii: tatas tv airAvataM nAgaM jajJe bhadramanA sutam
text.ur: tatas tv airāvataṁ nāgaṁ jajñe bhadramanā sutam

text.ascii: airAvataH sutas tasyA devanAgo mahAgajaH
text.ur: airāvataḥ sutas tasyā devanāgo mahāgajaḥ

text.ascii: haryAz ca harayo 'patyaM vAnarAz ca tarasvinaH
text.ur: haryāś ca harayo ’patyaṁ vānarāś ca tarasvinaḥ

text.ascii: golAGgUlAMz ca bhadraM te haryAH putrAn pracakSate
text.ur: golāṅgūlāṁś ca bhadraṁ te haryāḥ putrān pracakṣate

text.ascii: prajajJe tv atha zArdUlI siMhAn vyAghrAMz ca bhArata
text.ur: prajajñe tv atha śārdūlī siṁhān vyāghrāṁś ca bhārata

text.ascii: dvIpinaz ca mahAbhAga sarvAn eva na saMzayaH
text.ur: dvīpinaś ca mahābhāga sarvān eva na saṁśayaḥ

text.ascii: mAtaGgyAs tv atha mAtaGgA apatyAni narAdhipa
text.ur: mātaṅgyās tv atha mātaṅgā apatyāni narādhipa

text.ascii: dizAgajaM tu zvetAkhyaM zvetAjanayad Azugam
text.ur: diśāgajaṁ tu śvetākhyaṁ śvetājanayad āśugam

text.ascii: tathA duhitarau rAjan surabhir vai vyajAyata
text.ur: tathā duhitarau rājan surabhir vai vyajāyata

text.ascii: rohiNIM caiva bhadraM te gandharvIM ca yazasvinIm
text.ud: रोहिणीं चैव भद्रं ते गन्धर्वीं च यशस्विनीम्
text.ur: rohiṇīṁ caiva bhadraṁ te gandharvīṁ ca yaśasvinīm

text.ascii: rohiNyAM jajJire gAvo gandharvyAM vAjinaH sutAH
text.ud: रोहिण्यां जज्ञिरे गावो गन्धर्व्यां वाजिनः सुताः
text.ur: rohiṇyāṁ jajñire gāvo gandharvyāṁ vājinaḥ sutāḥ

text.ascii: surasAjanayan nAgAn rAjan kadrUz ca pannagAn
text.ur: surasājanayan nāgān rājan kadrūś ca pannagān

text.ascii: sapta piNDaphalAn vRkSAn analApi vyajAyata
text.ur: sapta piṇḍaphalān vr̥kṣān analāpi vyajāyata

text.ascii: analAyAH zukI putrI kadrvAs tu surasA sutA
text.ud: अनलायाः शुकी पुत्री कद्र्वास्तु सुरसा सुता
text.ur: analāyāḥ śukī putrī kadrvās tu surasā sutā

text.ascii: aruNasya bhAryA zyenI tu vIryavantau mahAbalau
text.ud: अरुणस्य भार्या श्येनी तु वीर्यवन्तौ महाबलौ
text.ur: aruṇasya bhāryā śyenī tu vīryavantau mahābalau

text.ascii: saMpAtiM janayAm Asa tathaiva ca jaTAyuSam
text.ur: saṁpātiṁ janayām āsa tathaiva ca jaṭāyuṣam

text.ascii: dvau putrau vinatAyAs tu vikhyAtau garuDAruNau
text.ur: dvau putrau vinatāyās tu vikhyātau garuḍāruṇau

text.ascii: ity eSa sarvabhUtAnAM mahatAM manujAdhipa
text.ur: ity eṣa sarvabhūtānāṁ mahatāṁ manujādhipa

text.ascii: prabhavaH kIrtitaH samyaG mayA matimatAM vara
text.ur: prabhavaḥ kīrtitaḥ samyaṅ mayā matimatāṁ vara

text.ascii: yaM zrutvA puruSaH samyak pUto bhavati pApmanaH
text.ud: यं श्रुत्वा पुरुषः सम्यक्पूतो भवति पाप्मनः
text.ur: yaṁ śrutvā puruṣaḥ samyak pūto bhavati pāpmanaḥ

text.ascii: sarvajJatAM ca labhate gatim agryAM ca vindati
text.ud: सर्वज्ञतां च लभते गतिमग्र्यां च विन्दति
text.ur: sarvajñatāṁ ca labhate gatim agryāṁ ca vindati
